body:
Comment 8: 
Attached patch fixes the rpath, but there's still issue with cgo:

/usr/lib/golang/pkg/linux_amd64/runtime/cgo.a
/tmp/buildd/golang-2011.02.01.1/src/pkg/runtime/cgo
/tmp/buildd/golang-2011.02.01.1/src/pkg/runtime/cgo
/tmp/buildd/golang-2011.02.01.1/src/pkg/runtime/cgo

And that's beyond my time-frame to debug where that comes from.  (aka have to go...)
Attachments: 1. 003-set_correct_runpath.patch (289 bytes)
